K02sspp2_1u:13: pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:14: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pṛthivīdhātvasattāyāṃ pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatāyāṃ pṛthivīdhātuviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:15: pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02sspp2_1u:16: upalabhyate. na cānyā pṛthivīdhātvasattānyā pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatānyā pṛthivīdhātuviviktatānyā
K02sspp2_1u:18: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca pṛthivīdhātvasattā yā ca pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā
K02sspp2_1u:19: yā ca pṛthivīdhātuviviktatā yā ca pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
K02sspp2_1u:20: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:21: abdhātvasattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abdhātuśūnyatayā pūrvāntano bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:32: abdhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:33: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābdhātvasattāyām abdhātuśūnyatāyām abdhātuviviktatāyām
K02sspp2_1u:34: abdhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:36: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cābdhātvasattā
K02sspp2_1u:37: yā cābdhātuśūnyatā yā cābdhātuviviktatā yā cābdhātvasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:38: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:50: tejodhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:51: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tejodhātvasattāyāṃ tejodhātuśūnyatāyāṃ tejodhātuviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:52: tejodhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:53: na cānyā tejodhātvasattānyā tejodhātuśūnyatānyā tejodhātuviviktatānyā tejodhātvasvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:54: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:55: yā ca tejodhātvasattā yā ca tejodhātuśūnyatā yā ca tejodhātuviviktatā yā ca tejodhātvasvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:56: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:69: vāyudhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:70: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vāyudhātvasattāyāṃ vāyudhātuśūnyatāyāṃ vāyudhātuviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:71: vāyudhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:72: na cānyā vāyudhātvasattānyā vāyudhātuśūnyatānyā vāyudhātuviviktatānyā vāyudhātvasvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:73: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:74: yā ca vāyudhātvasattā yā ca vāyudhātuśūnyatā yā ca vāyudhātuviviktatā yā ca vāyudhātvasvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:75: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:87: ākāśadhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:88: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśadhātvasattāyām ākāśadhātuśūnyatāyām ākāśadhātuviviktatāyām
K02sspp2_1u:89: ākāśadhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:90: na cānyā ākāśadhātvasattānyā ākāśadhātuśūnyatānyā ākāśadhātuviviktatānyā ākāśadhātvasvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:91: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:92: yā cākāśadhātvasattā yā cākāśadhātuśūnyatā yā cākāśadhātuviviktatā yā cākāśadhātvasvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:93: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:106: vijñānadhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:107: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vijñānadhātvasattāyāṃ vijñānadhātuśūnyatāyāṃ vijñānadhātuviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:108: vijñānadhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02sspp2_1u:109: upalabhyate. na cānyā vijñānadhātvasattānyā vijñānadhātuśūnyatānyā vijñānadhātuviviktatānyā
K02sspp2_1u:111: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca vijñānadhātvasattā yā ca vijñānadhātuśūnyatā
K02sspp2_1u:112: yā ca vijñānadhātuviviktatā yā ca vijñānadhātvasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
K02sspp2_1u:113: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:125: avidyāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:126: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāvidyāsattāyām avidyāśūnyatāyām avidyāviviktatāyām avidyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:127: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyāvidyāasattānyāvidyāśūnyatānyāvidyāviviktatānyāvidyāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:128: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:129: yā ca avidyāsattā yā ca avidyāśūnyatā yā ca avidyāviviktatā yā cāvidyāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:130: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac (ŚsP_II-1_5)
K02sspp2_1u:131: ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:143: saṃskārāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:144: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra saṃskārāsattāyāṃ saṃskāraśūnyatāyāṃ saṃskāraviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:145: saṃskārāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:146: na cānyā saṃskārāsattānyā saṃskāraśūnyatānyā saṃskāraviviktatānyā saṃskārāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:147: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:148: yā ca saṃskārāsattā yā ca saṃskāraśūnyatā yā ca saṃskāraviviktatā yā ca saṃskārāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:149: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:161: vijñānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:162: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vijñānāsattāyāṃ ca vijñānaśūnyatāyāṃ vijñānaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:163: vijñānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:164: na cānyā vijñānāsattānyā vijñānaśūnyatānyā vijñānaviviktatānyā vijñānāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:165: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:166: yā ca vijñānāsattā yā ca vijñānaśūnyatā yā ca vijñānaviviktatā yā ca vijñānāsvabhāvatā (ŚsP_II-1_6)
K02sspp2_1u:167: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:179: nāmarūpāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:180: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmarūpāsattāyāṃ nāmarūpaśūnyatāyāṃ nāmarūpaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:181: nāmarūpāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:182: na cānyā nāmarūpāsattānyā nāmarūpaśūnyatānyā nāmarūpaviviktatānyā nāmarūpāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:183: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:184: yā ca nāmarūpasattā yā ca nāmarūpaśūnyatā yā ca nāmarūpaviviktatā yā ca nāmarūpāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:185: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:197: ṣaḍāyatanāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:198: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra ṣaḍāyatanāsattāyāṃ ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyatāyāṃ ṣaḍāyatanaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:199: ṣaḍāyatanāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:200: na cānyā ṣaḍāyatanāsattānyā ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyatānyā ṣaḍāyatanaviviktatānyā ṣaḍāyatanāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:202: pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca ṣaḍāyatanāsattā
K02sspp2_1u:203: yā ca ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyatā yā ca ṣaḍāyatanaviviktatā yā ca ṣaḍāyatanāsvabhāvatā yaś
K02sspp2_1u:204: ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:216: sparśāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:217: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sparśāsattāyāṃ ca sparśaśūnyatāyāṃ sparśaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:218: sparśāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:219: na cānyā sparśāsattānyā sparśaśūnyatānyā sparśaviviktatānyā sparśāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:220: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca sparśāsattā
K02sspp2_1u:221: yā ca sparśaśūnyatā yā ca sparśaviviktatā yā ca sparśāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:222: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:234: vedanāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:235: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vedanāsattāyāṃ ca vedanāśūnyatāyāṃ vedanāviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:236: vedanāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:237: na cānyā vedanāsattānyā vedanāśūnyatānyā vedanāviviktatānyā vedanāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ (ŚsP_II-1_8)
K02sspp2_1u:238: pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca vedanāsattā
K02sspp2_1u:239: yā ca vedanāśūnyatā yā ca vedanāviviktatā yā ca vedanāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:240: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:252: tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:253: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tṛṣṇāsattāyāṃ ca tṛṣṇāśūnyatāyāṃ tṛṣṇāviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:254: tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:255: na cānyā tṛṣṇāsattānyā tṛṣṇāśūnyatānyā tṛṣṇāviviktatānyā tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:256: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca tṛṣṇāsattā
K02sspp2_1u:257: yā ca tṛṣṇāśūnyatā yā ca tṛṣṇāviviktatā yā ca tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:258: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:270: upādānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:271: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputropādānāsattāyām upādānaśūnyatāyām upādānaviviktatāyām
K02sspp2_1u:272: upādānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:273: na cānyā upādānāsattānyā upādānaśūnyatānyā upādānaviviktatānyā upādānāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:275: 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā copādānāsattā yā copādānaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_1u:276: yā copādānaviviktatā yā copādānāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś
K02sspp2_1u:277: cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:289: bhavāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:290: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bhavāsattāyāṃ ca bhavaśūnyatāyāṃ bhavaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:291: bhavāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:292: na cānyā bhavāsattānyā bhavaśūnyatānyā bhavaviviktatānyā bhavāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:293: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca bhavāsattā
K02sspp2_1u:294: yā ca bhavaśūnyatā yā ca bhavaviviktatā yā ca bhavāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:295: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:307: jātyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:308: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra jātyasattāyāṃ ca jātiśūnyatāyāṃ jātiviviktatāyāṃ jātyasvabhāvatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:309: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā jātyasattānyā
K02sspp2_1u:312: āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca jātyasattā yā ca jātiśūnyatā yā ca jātiviviktatā yā
K02sspp2_1u:313: ca jātyasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ
K02sspp2_1u:326: jarāmaraṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:327: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra jarāmaraṇāasattāyāṃ ca jarāmaraṇaśūnyatāyāṃ jarāmaraṇaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:328: jarāmaraṇasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:329: na cānyā jarāmaraṇāsattānyā jarāmaraṇaśūnyatānyā jarāmaraṇaviviktatānyā jarāmaraṇāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:330: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:331: yā ca jarāmaraṇāsattā yā ca jarāmaraṇaśūnyatā yā ca jarāmaraṇaviviktatā yā ca jarāmaraṇāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:332: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:344: dānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:345: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitāsattāyāṃ dānapāramitāśūnyatāyāṃ (ŚsP_II-1_11)
K02sspp2_1u:347: upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā dānapāramitāsattānyā dānapāramitāśūnyatānyā
K02sspp2_1u:349: 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca dānapāramitāsattā yā
K02sspp2_1u:350: ca dānapāramitāśūnyatā yā ca dānapāramitāviviktatā yā ca dānapāramitāsvabhāvatā yaś
K02sspp2_1u:351: ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:363: śīlapāramitāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:364: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śīlapāramitāsattāyāṃ śīlapāramitāśūnyatāyāṃ śīlapāramitāviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:365: śīlapāramitāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:366: na cānyā śīlapāramitāsattānyā śīlapāramitāśūnyatānyā śīlapāramitāviviktatānyā śīlapāramitāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:367: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:368: yā ca śīlapāramitāsattā yā ca śīlapāramitāśūnyatā yā ca śīlapāramitāviviktatā yā

K02sspp2_1u:747: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ abhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ abhāvaśūnyatāviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:748: abhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02sspp2_1u:750: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:751: yā cābhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:752: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:762: svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:763: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra svabhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:764: svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02sspp2_1u:765: upalabhyate. na cānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāsattānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatānyā
K02sspp2_1u:767: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā
K02sspp2_1u:768: yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:769: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:780: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:784: nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:785: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:786: yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā
K02sspp2_1u:787: yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
K02sspp2_1u:801: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:802: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra smṛtyupasthānāsattāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:803: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02sspp2_1u:804: upalabhyate. na cānyā smṛtyupasthānāsattānyā smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatānyā smṛtyupasthānaviviktatānyā
K02sspp2_1u:806: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsattā yā ca smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_1u:807: yā ca smṛtyupasthānaviviktatā yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
K02sspp2_1u:808: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:820: samyakprahāṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:821: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra samyakprahāṇāsattāyāṃ samyakprahāṇaśūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇaviviktatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ (ŚsP_II-1_26)
K02sspp2_1u:822: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā samyakprahāṇāsattānyā
K02sspp2_1u:824: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca samyakprahāṇāsattā
K02sspp2_1u:825: yā ca samyakprahāṇaśūnyatā yā ca samyakprahāṇaviviktatā yā ca samyakprahāṇāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:826: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:833: ṛddhipādaviviktatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:837: ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:838: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrarddhipādāsattāyām ṛddhipādaśūnyatāyām ṛddhipādaviviktatāyām
K02sspp2_1u:839: ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:840: na cānyā ṛddhipādāsattānyā ṛddhipādaśūnyatānyā ṛddhipādaviviktatānyā ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:841: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:842: yā carddhipādāsattā yā carddhipādaśūnyatā yā carddhipādaviviktatā yā carddhipādāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:843: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:856: madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:857: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrendriyāsattāyām indriyaśūnyatāyām indriyaviviktatāyām
K02sspp2_1u:858: indriyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:859: na cānyā indriyāsattānyā indriyaśūnyatānyā indriyaviviktatānyā indriyāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:860: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:861: yā cendriyāsattā yā cendriyaśūnyatā yā cendriyaviviktatā yā cendriyāsvabhāvatā yaś
K02sspp2_1u:862: ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:874: balāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:875: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra balāsattāyāṃ balaśūnyatāyāṃ balaviviktatāyāṃ balāsvabhāvatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:876: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā balāsattānyā
K02sspp2_1u:878: 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca balāsattā yā ca balaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_1u:879: yā ca balaviviktatā yā ca balāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
K02sspp2_1u:880: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:894: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhyaṅgāsattāyāṃ bodhyaṅgaśūnyatāyāṃ bodhyaṅgaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:895: bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:896: na cānyā bodhyaṅgāsattānyā bodhyaṅgaśūnyatānyā bodhyaṅgaviviktatānyā bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:897: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:898: yā ca bodhyaṅgāsattā yā ca bodhyaṅgaśūnyatā yā ca bodhyaṅgaviviktatā yā ca bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:899: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:911: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:912: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsattāyām āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatāyām āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaviviktatāyām
K02sspp2_1u:913: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02sspp2_1u:914: upalabhyate. na cānyā āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsattānyā āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatānyā āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaviviktatānyā
K02sspp2_1u:916: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsattā yā cāryaṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_1u:917: yā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaviviktatā yā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
K02sspp2_1u:918: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:930: āryasatyāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:931: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāryasatyāsattāyām āryasatyaśūnyatāyām āryasatyaviviktatāyām
K02sspp2_1u:932: āryasatyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:934: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:935: yā cāryasatyāsattā yā cāryasatyaśūnyatā yā cāryasatyaviviktatā yā cāryasatyāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:936: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:948: dhyānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:949: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānāsattāyāṃ dhyānaśūnyatāyāṃ dhyānaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:950: dhyānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:951: na cānyā dhyānāsattānyā dhyānaśūnyatānyā dhyānaviviktatānyā dhyānāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:952: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca dhyānāsattā
K02sspp2_1u:953: yā ca dhyānaśūnyatā yā ca dhyānaviviktatā yā ca dhyānāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:954: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:967: apramāṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:968: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāpramāṇāsattāyām apramāṇaśūnyatāyām apramāṇaviviktatāyām
K02sspp2_1u:969: apramāṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:971: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cāpramāṇāsattā
K02sspp2_1u:972: yā cāpramāṇaśūnyatā yā cāpramāṇaviviktatā yā cāpramāṇāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:973: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:985: ārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:986: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrārūpyasamāpattyasattāyām ārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatāyām ārūpyasamāpatti
K02sspp2_1u:987: viviktatāyām ārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
K02sspp2_1u:988: na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā ārūpyasamāpattyasattānyā ārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatānyā
K02sspp2_1u:990: 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cārūpyasamāpattyasattā
K02sspp2_1u:992: yā cārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:994: vimokṣaśūnyatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. vimokṣaviviktatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1003: vimokṣāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1004: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vimokṣāsattāyāṃ vimokṣaśūnyatāyāṃ vimokṣaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1005: vimokṣāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1006: na cānyā vimokṣāsattānyā vimokṣaśūnyatānyā vimokṣaviviktatānyā vimokṣāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1007: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1008: yā ca vimokṣāsattā yā ca vimokṣaśūnyatā yā ca vimokṣaviviktatā yā ca vimokṣāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:1009: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1021: anupūrvavihārasamāpattyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1026: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1027: yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattyasattā yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśūnyatā yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattiviviktatā
K02sspp2_1u:1028: yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattyasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
K02sspp2_1u:1029: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1041: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1044: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsattānyā
K02sspp2_1u:1047: 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsattā
K02sspp2_1u:1048: yā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaśūnyatā yā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaviviktatā yā ca (ŚsP_II-1_33)
K02sspp2_1u:1049: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1061: abhijñāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1062: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhijñāsattāyām abhijñāśūnyatāyām abhijñāviviktatāyām
K02sspp2_1u:1063: abhijñāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1065: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cābhijñāsattā
K02sspp2_1u:1066: yā cābhijñāśūnyatā yā cābhijñāviviktatā yā cābhijñāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_1u:1067: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1079: samādhyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1080: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra samādhyasattāyāṃ samādhiśūnyatāyāṃ samādhiviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1081: samādhyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1082: na cānyā samādhyasattānyā samādhiśūnyatānyā samādhiviviktatānyā samādhyasvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1084: 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca samādhyasattā yā ca samādhiśūnyatā
K02sspp2_1u:1085: yā ca samādhiviviktatā yā ca samādhyasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto
K02sspp2_1u:1086: yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1098: dhāraṇīmukhāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1099: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhāraṇīmukhāsattāyāṃ dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatāyāṃ dhāraṇīmukhaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1100: dhāraṇīmukhāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1101: na cānyā dhāraṇīmukhāsattānyā dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatānyā dhāraṇīmukhaviviktatānyā dhāraṇīmukhāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1102: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1103: yā ca dhāraṇīmukhāsattā yā ca dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatā yā ca dhāraṇīmukhaviviktatā yā
K02sspp2_1u:1104: ca dhāraṇīmukhāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca
K02sspp2_1u:1117: tathāgatabalāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1120: tathāgatabalāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02sspp2_1u:1121: upalabhyate. na cānyā tathāgatabalāsattānyā tathāgatabalaśūnyatānyā tathāgatabalaviviktatānyā
K02sspp2_1u:1123: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca tathāgatabalāsattā yā ca tathāgatabalaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_1u:1124: yā ca tathāgatabalaviviktatā yā ca tathāgatabalāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
K02sspp2_1u:1125: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1137: vaiśāradyāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1138: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vaiśāradyāsattāyāṃ vaiśāradyaśūnyatāyāṃ vaiśāradyaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1139: vaiśāradyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1140: na cānyā vaiśāradyāsattānyā vaiśāradyaśūnyatānyā vaiśāradyaviviktatānyā vaiśāradyāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1141: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1142: yā ca vaiśāradyāsattā yā ca vaiśāradyaśūnyatā yā ca vaiśāradyaviviktatā yā ca vaiśāradyāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:1143: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1156: pratisaṃvidasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1157: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pratisaṃvidasattāyāṃ pratisaṃvidśūnyatāyāṃ pratisaṃvidviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1158: pratisaṃvidasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1159: na cānyā pratisaṃvidasattānyā pratisaṃvidśūnyatānyā pratisaṃvidviviktatānyā pratisaṃvidasvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1160: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1161: yā ca pratisaṃvidasattā yā ca pratisaṃvidśūnyatā yā ca pratisaṃvidviviktatā yā ca
K02sspp2_1u:1162: pratisaṃvidasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1175: mahākaruṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1176: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra mahākaruṇāsattāyāṃ mahākaruṇāśūnyatāyāṃ mahākaruṇāviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1177: mahākaruṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1178: na cānyā mahākaruṇāsattānyā mahākaruṇāśūnyatānyā mahākaruṇāviviktatānyā mahākaruṇāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1179: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1180: yā ca mahākaruṇāsattā yā ca mahākaruṇāśūnyatā yā ca mahākaruṇāviviktatā yā ca mahākaruṇāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:1181: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1182: āveṇikabuddhadharmāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. āveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1192: āveṇikabuddhadharmāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1195: nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyāveṇikabuddhadharmāsattānyāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatānyāveṇikabuddhadharmaviviktatānyāveṇikabuddhadharmāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1196: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1197: yā cāveṇikabuddhadharmāsattā yā cāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatā yā cāveṇikabuddhadharmaviviktatā
K02sspp2_1u:1198: yā cāveṇikabuddhadharmāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
K02sspp2_1u:1199: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1200: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dharmadhātvasattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1211: dharmadhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1212: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dharmadhātvasattāyāṃ dharmadhātuśūnyatāyāṃ dharmadhātuviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1213: dharmadhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1214: na cānyā dharmadhātvasattānyā dharmadhātvśūnyatānyā dharmadhātuviviktānyā dharmadhātvasvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1216: 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca dharmadhātvasattā
K02sspp2_1u:1217: ya ca dharmadhātuśūnyatā yā ca dharmadhātuviviktatā yā ca dharmadhātvasvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:1218: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1219: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tathatāsattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1230: tathatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1231: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tathatāsattāyāṃ tathatāśūnyatāyāṃ tathatāviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1232: tathatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1233: na cānyā tathatāsattānyā tathatāśūnyatānyā tathatāviviktānyā tathatāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1234: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1235: yā ca tathatāsattā yā ca tathatāśūnyatā yā ca tathatāviviktatā yā ca tathatāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:1236: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1237: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bhūtakoṭyasattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1248: bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1251: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate. na cānyā bhūtakoṭyasattānyā
K02sspp2_1u:1253: pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca bhūtakoṭyasattā
K02sspp2_1u:1254: yā ca bhūtakoṭiśūnyatā yā ca bhūtakoṭiviviktatā yā ca bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatā yaś ca
K02sspp2_1u:1255: bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1256: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrācintyadhātvasattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1267: acintyadhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1268: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrācintyadhātvasattāyām acintyadhātuśūnyatāyām acintyadhātuviviktatāyām
K02sspp2_1u:1269: acintyadhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02sspp2_1u:1271: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1272: yā cācintyadhātvasattā yā cācintyadhātuśūnyatā yā cācintyadhātuviviktatā yā cācintyadhātv
K02sspp2_1u:1273: asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam
K02sspp2_1u:1275: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śrāvakāsattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1287: śrāvakāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1288: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śrāvakāsattāyāṃ śrāvakaśūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1289: śrāvakāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1290: na cānyā śrāvakāsattānyā śrāvakaśūnyatānyā śrāvakaviviktānyā śrāvakāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1291: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1292: yā ca śrāvakāsattā yā ca śrāvakaśūnyatā yā ca śrāvakaviviktatā yā ca śrāvakāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_1u:1293: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1294: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pratyekabuddhāsattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1305: pratyekabuddhāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1306: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pratyekabuddhāsattāyāṃ pratyekabuddhaśūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1307: pratyekabuddhāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02sspp2_1u:1308: upalabyate. na cānyā pratyekabuddhāsattānyā pratyekabuddhaśūnyatānyā pratyekabuddhaviviktānyā
K02sspp2_1u:1310: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca pratyekabuddhāsattā yā ca pratyekabuddhaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_1u:1311: yā ca pratyekabuddhaviviktatā yā ca pratyekabuddhāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
K02sspp2_1u:1312: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:1313: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvāsattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1324: bodhisattvāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1325: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvāsattāyāṃ bodhisattvaśūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1326: bodhisattvāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1327: na cānyā bodhisattvāsattānyā bodhisattvaśūnyatānyā bodhisattvaviviktānyā bodhisattvāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1328: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:1329: yā ca bodhisattvāsattā yā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā yā ca bodhisattvaviviktatā yā ca
K02sspp2_1u:1330: bodhisattvāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1332: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvajñāsattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1343: sarvajñāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1344: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvajñāsattāyāṃ sarvajñaśūnyatāyāṃ sarvajñaviviktatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:1345: sarvajñāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1346: na cānyā sarvajñāsattānyā sarvajñaśūnyatānyā sarvajñaviviktānyā sarvajñāsvabhāvatānyo
K02sspp2_1u:1348: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca sarvajñāsattā yā ca sarvajñaśūnyatā yā ca sarvajñaviviktatā
K02sspp2_1u:1349: yā ca sarvajñāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca
K02sspp2_1u:1351: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K02sspp2_1u:1355: kena kāraṇena rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti. rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1356: tadyathāpi nāmāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
K02sspp2_1u:1357: na madhyam upalabhyate. anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti nāma vyavahriyate. evam evāyuṣmañ
K02sspp2_1u:1358: chāradvatīputra na rūpasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
K02sspp2_1u:1359: upalabhyate rūpaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ
K02sspp2_1u:1362: kena kāraṇena vedanāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti. vedanā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1363: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:1365: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
K02sspp2_1u:1366: na madhyam upalabhyate vedanāśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:1367: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vedanāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
K02sspp2_1u:1370: saṃjñā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1371: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:1373: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra saṃjñāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate saṃjñāśūnyatām upādāya,
K02sspp2_1u:1374: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa (ŚsP_II-1_43)
K02sspp2_1u:1378: saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1379: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:1381: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra saṃskārāṇāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate saṃskāraśūnyatām upādāya,
K02sspp2_1u:1382: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃskārāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
K02sspp2_1u:1385: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1386: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:1388: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vijñānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate vijñānaśūnyatām upādāya,
K02sspp2_1u:1389: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
K02sspp2_1u:1392: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1393: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:1395: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra cakṣuṣo na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate cakṣurśūnyatām upādāya,
K02sspp2_1u:1396: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa cakṣuṣo 'paryantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
K02sspp2_1u:1399: śrotram āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1400: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:1402: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na śrotrasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate śrotraśūnyatām (ŚsP_II-1_44)
K02sspp2_1u:1403: upādāya, na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa śrotrāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
K02sspp2_1u:1406: ghrāṇam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1407: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:1409: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra ghrāṇasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate ghrāṇaśūnyatām upādāya,
K02sspp2_1u:1410: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ghrāṇāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
K02sspp2_1u:1413: jihvā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1414: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:1416: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra jihvāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate jihvāśūnyatām upādāya,
K02sspp2_1u:1417: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa jihvāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
K02sspp2_1u:1420: kāya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:1421: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:1423: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kāyasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate kāyaśūnyatām upādāya,

K02sspp2_1u:2182: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:2183: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2184: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dānapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2185: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. kṣāntipāramitā kṣāntipāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2186: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. vīryapāramitā vīryapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2187: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. dhyānapāramitā dhyānapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2188: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2189: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
K02sspp2_1u:2190: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrādhyātmaśūnyatādhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2191: na hi śūnyatāyām adhyātmaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2192: bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2193: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2194: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2195: na hi śūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2196: śūnyatāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2197: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2198: mahāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2199: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mahāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2200: paramārthaśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2201: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ paramārthaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2202: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2203: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2205: na hi śūnyatāyām asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2207: na hi śūnyatāyām atyantaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2209: na hi śūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2211: na hi śūnyatāyām anavakāraśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2212: prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2213: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2216: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2217: svalakṣanaśūnyatā svalakṣanaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2218: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ svalakṣanaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2220: na hi śūnyatāyām anupalambhaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2222: na hi śūnyatāyām abhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2223: bhāvaśūnyatā bhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2224: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:2226: na hi śūnyatāyām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
K02sspp2_1u:2227: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2228: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. samyakprahāṇāni samyakprahāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2229: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. ṛddhipādā ṛddhipādaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2230: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. indriyāṇīndriyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2231: na hi śūnyatāyām indriyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2232: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ balāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2233: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhyaṅgāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2234: na hi śūnyatāyām āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. āryasatyāny āryasatyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2235: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ āryasatyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2236: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhyānāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. apramāṇāny apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2237: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ apramāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. ārūpyasamāpattaya ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2238: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. aṣṭau vimokṣā vimokṣaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2239: na hi śūnyatāyām aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2240: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ saṃvidyante na (ŚsP_II-1_72)
K02sspp2_1u:2241: bodhisattvaḥ. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣa mukhaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2242: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2243: na hi śūnyatāyām abhijñāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2244: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samādhayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2245: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhāraṇīmukhāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. tathāgatabalāni tathāgatabalaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2246: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgatabalāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. vaiśāradyāni vaiśāradyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2247: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vaiśāradyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. pratisaṃvidaḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2248: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratisaṃvidaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. mahākaruṇā mahākaruṇayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2249: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mahākaruṇā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. āveṇikabuddhadharmā āveṇikabuddhadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2250: na hi śūnyatāyām āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2251: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dharmadhātuḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. tathatā tathatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2252: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭyā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2253: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. acintyadhātur acintyadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2254: na hi śūnyatāyām acintyadhātuḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. sarvajñatā sarvajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2255: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2256: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mārgākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2257: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2258: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2259: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2260: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ buddhayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakaḥ śrāvakena śūnyaḥ. tat (ŚsP_II-1_73)
K02sspp2_1u:2262: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2263: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. tathāgatas tathāgatena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2264: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgataḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
K02sspp2_1u:2265: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2266: vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2267: saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2268: saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2269: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:2270: yad apy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra evam āha kena kāraṇena vadasi,
K02sspp2_1u:2271: evam āha sarveṇa sarvaṃ bodhisattvam anupalambhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ vadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti.
K02sspp2_1u:2272: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2285: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2289: cakṣuḥ śrotraś ca ghrāṇe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2321: cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānañ ca ghrāṇavijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2337: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2340: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2343: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2370: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātuś ca tejodhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2372: tejodhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātāv abdhātau ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2373: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātuḥ tejodhātur vāyudhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2376: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātur ākāśadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2379: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vā vijñānadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2386: avidyā saṃskārāś ca vijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2388: vijñānam avidyāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2420: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2423: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2426: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2429: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2439: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2442: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2445: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2508: smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02sspp2_1u:2510: ṛddhipādāḥ smṛtyupasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu ca na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02sspp2_1u:2527: āryasatyāni dhyānāni cāpramāṇeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02sspp2_1u:2529: apramāṇāny āryasatyeṣu dhyāneṣu ca na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02sspp2_1u:2555: tathāgatabalāni vaiśāradyāni ca pratisaṃvitsu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02sspp2_1u:2565: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāś ca srotaāpattidharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02sspp2_1u:2568: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭakadharmāḥ srotaāpattidharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02sspp2_1u:2571: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhattvadharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02sspp2_1u:2574: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhaddharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02sspp2_1u:2577: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā arhaddharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
K02sspp2_1u:2584: pṛthagjanabhūmir gotrabhūmiś cāṣṭamakabhūmau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2613: sarvajñatā mārgākārajñatā ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2620: srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī cānāgāmini na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2622: anāgāmī srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmini ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2641: avavādānuśāsanī bodhisattvaprajñāpāramitayor na saṃvidyate nopa labhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:2642: evam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvadharmeṣv asaṃvidyamāneṣv anupalabhamāneṣu bodhisattvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_1u:2643: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivaṃ vadasi kena kāraṇena nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta punar bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2644: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2645: tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2646: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2647: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02sspp2_1u:2648: yac ca nāmadheyamātrañ ca na tad rūpaṃ na sā vedanā na sā saṃjñā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2649: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2650: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣur iti śrotram iti ghrāṇam iti jihveti kāya iti mana iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2651: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02sspp2_1u:2652: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣur na śrotraṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ na sā jihvā na sa kāyo na tan manaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2653: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2654: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti śabda iti gandha iti rasa iti sparśa iti dharmā iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2655: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02sspp2_1u:2656: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tad rūpaṃ na sa śabdo na gandho na sa raso na sa sparśo na te dharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2657: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2658: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣurvijñām iti śrotravijñānam iti ghrāṇavijñānam iti jihvāvijñānam iti kāyavijñānam iti manovijñānam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2659: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02sspp2_1u:2660: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ na tan manovijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2661: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2662: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa iti śrotrasaṃsparśa iti ghrāṇasaṃsparśa iti jihvāsaṃsparśa
K02sspp2_1u:2664: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02sspp2_1u:2665: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśo na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2666: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2667: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti
K02sspp2_1u:2670: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02sspp2_1u:2671: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
K02sspp2_1u:2672: na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
K02sspp2_1u:2673: na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2674: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāmaṃ tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2675: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta pṛthivīdhātur ity abdhātur iti tejodhātur iti vāyudhātur ity ākāśadhātur iti vijñānadhātur iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2676: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02sspp2_1u:2677: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa pṛthivīdhātur na so 'bdhātur na sa tejodhātur na sa vāyudhātur na sa ākāśadhātur na sa vijñānadhātuḥ. tat kasya
K02sspp2_1u:2678: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2679: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāvidyeti saṃskārā
K02sspp2_1u:2680: iti vijñānam iti nāmarūpam iti ṣaḍāyatanam iti sparśam iti vedaneti tṛṣṇety upādānam
K02sspp2_1u:2681: iti bhava iti jātir iti jarāmaraṇam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2682: tathā hi na nāma kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
K02sspp2_1u:2683: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sāvidyā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ
K02sspp2_1u:2684: na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sa sparśo na sā vedanā na sā tṛṣṇā na tad upādānaṃ na sa bhavo
K02sspp2_1u:2685: na sā jātir na taj jarāmaraṇam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2686: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ na nāma svabhāvena (ŚsP_II-1_93)
K02sspp2_1u:2687: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2688: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramitā na ca nāmni dānapāramitā na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya
K02sspp2_1u:2689: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2690: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2691: namadheyamātram etad yad uta śīlapāramitā na ca nāmni śīlapāramitā na ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2692: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca śīlapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2693: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2694: nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta kṣāntipāramitā na ca nāmni kṣāntipāramitā na ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2695: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca kṣāntipāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2696: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2697: namadheyamātram etad yad uta vīryapāramitā na ca nāmni vīryapāramitā na ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2698: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca vīryapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2699: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2700: namadheyamātram etad yad uta dhyānapāramitā na ca nāmni dhyānapāramitā na ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2701: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dhyānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2702: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2703: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramitā na ca nāmni prajñāpāramitā na ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2704: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prajñāpāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2705: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2706: namadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā na cādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2707: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2708: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2709: namadheyamātram etad yad uta bahirdhāśūnyatā na ca bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ (ŚsP_II-1_94)
K02sspp2_1u:2710: nāma na ca nāmni bahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2711: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2712: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2713: namadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2714: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2715: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2716: namadheyamātram etad yad uta śūnyatāśūnyatā na ca śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni śūnyatāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2717: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca śūnyatāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2718: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2719: namadheyamātram etad yad uta mahāśūnyatā na ca mahāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni mahāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2720: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca mahāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2721: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2722: namadheyamātram etad yad uta paramārthaśūnyatā na ca paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni paramārthaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2723: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca paramārthaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2724: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2725: namadheyamātram etad yad uta saṃskṛtaśūnyatā na ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni saṃskṛtaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2726: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2727: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2728: namadheyamātram etad yad utāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā na cāsaṃskṛtasunyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2729: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cāsaṃskṛtaśunyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2730: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2731: namadheyamātram etad yad utātyantaśūnyatā na cātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny atyantaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2732: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cātyantaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2733: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2734: nāmadheyamātram etad yad utānavarāgraśūnyatā na cānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anavarāgraśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā (ŚsP_II-1_95)
K02sspp2_1u:2735: hi yac ca nāma yā cānavarāgraśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2736: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2737: namadheyamātram etad yad utānavakāraśūnyatā na cānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anavakāraśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2738: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cānavakāraśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2739: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2740: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni prakṛtiśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2741: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2742: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2743: namadheyamātram etad yad uta sarvadharmaśūnyatā na ca sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvadharmaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2744: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2745: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2746: namadheyamātram etad yad uta svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā na ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2747: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2748: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2749: namadheyamātram etad yad utānupalambhaśūnyatā na cānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anupalambhaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2750: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cānupalambhaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2751: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2752: namadheyamātram etad yad utābhāvaśūnyatā na cābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny abhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2753: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cābhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2754: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2755: namadheyamātram etad yad uta svabhāvaśūnyatā na ca svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni svabhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2756: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2757: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
K02sspp2_1u:2758: namadheyamātram etad yad utābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na cabhavasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2759: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na (ŚsP_II-1_96)
K02sspp2_1u:2761: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2762: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2763: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta smṛtyupasthānānīti na ca smṛtyupasthāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni smṛtyupasthānāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2764: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca smṛtyupasthānāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2765: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2766: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta samyakprahāṇānīti na ca samyakprahāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni samyakprahāṇāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2767: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca samyakprahāṇāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2768: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2769: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utarddhipādā iti na carddhipādeṣu nāma na ca nāmny ṛddhipādāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2770: tathā hi yac ca nāma ye carddhipādā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2771: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2772: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utendriyānīti na cendriyeṣu nāma na ca nāmnīndriyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2773: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni cendriyāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2774: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2775: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta balānīti na ca baleṣu nāma na ca nāmni balāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2776: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca balāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2777: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2778: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhyaṅgānīti na ca bodhyaṅgeṣu nāma na ca nāmni bodhyaṅgāni. tat kasya
K02sspp2_1u:2779: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca bodhyaṅgāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2780: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2781: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ (ŚsP_II-1_97)
K02sspp2_1u:2782: yad utāryāṣṭāṅgo mārga iti na cāryāṣṭāṅge marge nāma na ca nāmny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2783: tathā hi yac ca nāma yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgo mārga ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2784: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2785: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāryasatyānīti na cāryāsatyeṣu nāma na ca nāmny ārysatyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2786: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni cāryasatyāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2787: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2788: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta dhyānānīti na ca dhyāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni dhyānāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2789: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca dhyānāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2790: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2791: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāpramāṇānīti na cāpramāṇeṣu nāma na ca nāmny apramāṇāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2792: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni cāpramāṇāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2793: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2794: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utārūpyasamāpattaya iti na cārūpyasamāpattiṣu nāma na ca nāmny ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2795: tathā hi yac ca nāma ye cārūpyasamāpattaya ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2796: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2797: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta vimokṣā iti na ca vimokṣeṣu nāma na ca nāmni vimokṣāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2798: tathā hi yac ca nāma ye ca vimokṣā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2799: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2800: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya
K02sspp2_1u:2801: iti na ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu nāma na ca nāmny anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2802: tathā hi yac ca nāma ye cānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2803: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2804: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta śūnytānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti na ca vimokṣamukheṣu nāma na ca nāmni vimokṣamukhāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2805: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca vimokṣamukhāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2806: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2807: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utābhijñā iti na cābhijñāṣu nāma na ca nāmny abhijñāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2808: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāś cābhijñā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2809: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2810: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta samādhaya iti na ca samādhiṣu nāma na ca nāmni samādhayaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2811: tathā hi yac ca nāma ye ca samādhaya ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2812: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2813: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta dhāraṇīmukhānīti na ca dhāraṇīmukheṣu nāma na ca nāmni dhāraṇīmukhāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2814: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2815: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2816: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta daśatathāgatabalānīti na ca tathāgatabaleṣu nāma na ca nāmni tathāgatabalāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2817: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca tathāgatabalāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2818: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2819: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta catvāri vaiśāradyānīti na ca vaiśāradyeṣu nāma na ca nāmni vaiśāradyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2820: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca vaiśāradyāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2821: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2822: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti na ca pratisaṃvitṣu nāma na ca nāmni pratisaṃvidaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2823: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāś ca pratisaṃvida ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2824: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2825: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta mahāmaitrīti na ca mahāmaitryāṃ nāma na ca nāmni mahāmaitrī. tat kasya
K02sspp2_1u:2826: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca mahāmaitry ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2827: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2828: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta mahākaruṇeti na ca mahākaruṇāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni mahākaruṇā. tat kasya
K02sspp2_1u:2829: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca mahākaruṇā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2830: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2831: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāṣṭādaśāveṇikā
K02sspp2_1u:2832: buddhadharmā iti na cāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu nāma na ca nāmny āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?

K02sspp2_1u:2834: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2835: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta sarvajñateti na ca sarvajñatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvajñatā. tat kasya
K02sspp2_1u:2836: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvajñatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2837: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2838: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta mārgākārajñateti na ca mārgākārajñatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni mārgākārajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2839: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca mārgākārajñatobhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2840: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2841: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta sarvākārajñateti na ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvākārajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:2842: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvākārajñatobhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_1u:2843: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
K02sspp2_1u:2847: yathā sattvaḥ sattva ity ucyate 'tyantatayā cānabhinirvṛttaḥ sattva iti,

K02sspp2_1u:2859: yathā paśyakaḥ paśyaka ity ucyate 'tyantatayā cānabhinirvṛttaḥ paśyaka iti.

K02sspp2_1u:2873: atyantatayā paśyako na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kuto 'syābhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_1u:2874: atyantatayā rūpaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kuto 'syābhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati,

K02sspp2_1u:2876: atyantatayā saṃjñā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kuto 'syābhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_1u:2877: atyantatayā saṃskārā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante kuto 'syābhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati,

K02sspp2_1u:2882: bhaviṣyati. atyantatayā kāyo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kuto 'syābhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati.

K02sspp2_1u:2888: nopalabhyate kuto 'syābhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati. atyantatayā dharmā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate

K02sspp2_1u:2900: atyantatayā kāyasaṃsparśo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kuto 'syābhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_1u:2901: atyantatayā manaḥsaṃsparśo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kuto 'syābhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati.

K02sspp2_1u:2909: atyantatayā pṛthivīdhātur na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate kuto 'syābhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati.

K02sspp2_1u:2927: atyantatayā kṣāntipāramitā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante kuto 'syābhinirvṛttir bhaviṣyati.

K02sspp2_1u:4644: smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākūṭasthāny avināśīni. tat kasya hetoḥ?

K02sspp2_1u:4674: prakṛtir eṣām iyam. anāsravā dharmā akūṭasthā avināśinaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4675: prakṛtir eṣām iyam. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇābhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
K02sspp2_1u:4681: kena kāraṇena vijñānam anabhinirvṛttam iti vadasi,
K02sspp2_1u:4682: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4683: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpam anabhisaṃskṛtaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:4693: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatiputrānabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4727: cakṣurvijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4728: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. śrotravijñānam anabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4729: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. ghrāṇavijñānam anabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4730: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. jihvāvijñānam anabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4731: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. kāyavijñānam anabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4732: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. manovijñānam anabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4762: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. abdhātur anabhisaṃskṛtaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4764: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. tejodhātur anabhisaṃskṛtaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4766: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. vāyudhātur anabhisaṃskṛtaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4768: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. ākāśadhātur anabhisaṃskṛtaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4770: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. vijñānadhātur anabhisaṃskṛtaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4775: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. saṃskārā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4777: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. vijñānam anabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

K02sspp2_1u:4779: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. ṣaḍāyatanam anabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4786: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. upādānam anabhisaṃskṛtam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4848: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. samyakprahāṇāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
K02sspp2_1u:4850: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. ṛddhipādā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4852: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. indriyāṇy anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
K02sspp2_1u:4854: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. balāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
K02sspp2_1u:4856: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. bodhyaṅgāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
K02sspp2_1u:4858: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nabhisaṃskṛtāni,
