K02sspp2_1u:4863: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. dhyānāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
K02sspp2_1u:4865: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. apramāṇāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
K02sspp2_1u:4869: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. vimokṣā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4873: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
K02sspp2_1u:4875: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. abhijñā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4879: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. dhāraṇīmukhāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
K02sspp2_1u:4881: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. daśatathāgatabalāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
K02sspp2_1u:4883: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. catvāri vaiśāradyāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
K02sspp2_1u:4885: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nabhisaṃskṛtāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4887: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. mahāmaitry anabhisaṃskṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:4891: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4894: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpam anabhinirvṛttaṃ vedanānabhinirvṛttā saṃjñānabhinirvṛttā saṃskārā anabhinirvṛttā vijñānam anabhinirvṛttam.
K02sspp2_1u:4896: kena kāraṇenāyuṣmañ subhūte yad anabhinirvṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:4900: yad anabhinirvṛttaṃ na tad vijñānam iti vadasi?
K02sspp2_1u:4901: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:4902: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4903: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4904: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃjñā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4905: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃskārāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā
K02sspp2_1u:4906: yā ca prakṛtiśūnyās teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ
K02sspp2_1u:4907: prajñāyate. vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4908: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:4909: cakṣuḥ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4910: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śrotraṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4911: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4912: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4913: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4914: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. manaḥ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4915: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:4916: rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4917: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śabdaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4919: na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. gandhaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4920: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. rasaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4921: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. sparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4922: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4923: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:4924: cakṣurvijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4925: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śrotravijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4926: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇavijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4927: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvāvijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4928: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyavijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4929: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. manovijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4930: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:4931: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4932: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4933: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4934: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4935: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyasaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4936: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4937: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:4938: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4939: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ (ŚsP_II-1_151)
K02sspp2_1u:4940: prajñāyate. śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4941: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na
K02sspp2_1u:4942: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na
K02sspp2_1u:4943: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na
K02sspp2_1u:4944: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na
K02sspp2_1u:4945: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:4946: pṛthivīdhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4947: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. abdhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4948: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. tejodhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4949: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vāyudhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4950: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ākāśadhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4951: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vijñānadhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4952: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:4953: avidyā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4954: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃskārāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4955: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4956: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. nāmarūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4957: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ṣaḍāyatanaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4958: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. sparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4959: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ (ŚsP_II-1_152)
K02sspp2_1u:4960: prajñāyate. vedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4961: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. tṛṣṇā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4962: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. upādānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4963: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. bhavaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4964: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jātiḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4965: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. jarāmaraṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4966: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:4967: dānapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4968: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śīlapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4969: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. kṣāntipāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4970: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. vīryapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4971: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhyānapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4972: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. prajñāpāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4973: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:4974: adhyātmaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4975: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. bahirdhāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4976: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4977: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. śūnyatāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4978: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. mahāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ, (ŚsP_II-1_153)
K02sspp2_1u:4979: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. paramārthaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4980: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. saṃskṛtaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4981: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4982: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. atyantaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4983: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. anavarāgraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4984: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4985: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā y ā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4986: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. sarvadharmaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4987: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4988: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthity anyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. anupalambhaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4989: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. abhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4990: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. svabhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4991: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4992: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:4993: smṛtyupasthānāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4994: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. samyakprahāṇāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4995: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. ṛddhipādā prakṛtiśūnyā y ā ca prakṛtiśūnyās teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4996: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. indriyāṇi prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ, yeṣāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:4997: notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. balāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4998: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. bodhyaṅgāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:4999: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5000: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. āryasatyāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5001: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhyānāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5002: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. apramāṇāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5003: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5004: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5005: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5006: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5007: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. abhijñā prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5008: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. samādhayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5009: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhāraṇīmukhāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5010: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. daśatathāgatabalāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5011: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. catvāri vaiśāradyāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5012: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5013: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. mahāmaitrī prakṛtiśūnyā (ŚsP_II-1_155)
K02sspp2_1u:5014: yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5015: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. mahākaruṇā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5016: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5017: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
K02sspp2_1u:5018: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad anabhisaṃskṛtaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5097: ye 'nabhisaṃskṛtā na te ṛddhipādāḥ yāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni na tānīndriyāṇi,
K02sspp2_1u:5114: yā anabhisaṃskṛtā na tāś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5123: tat kim anabhinirvṛttaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyām anuśāsiṣyāmīti?
K02sspp2_1u:5124: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yānabhinirvṛttiḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_1u:5125: sānābhinirvṛttir iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prajñāpāramitā cābhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5127: tat kim anabhinirvṛttiṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi.
K02sspp2_1u:5129: kena kāraṇena nānyatrābhivṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya cared iti. tathā
K02sspp2_1u:5130: hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran nānyam
K02sspp2_1u:5131: anabhinirvṛttim anyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyati. iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bodhisattvaś
K02sspp2_1u:5134: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā vedanā samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5135: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃjñāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5136: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃjñā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃskārān samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5137: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskārāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5138: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5140: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatranabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotraṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5142: cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5143: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5144: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5145: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ manaḥ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5146: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5148: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śabdaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5149: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śabdaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā gandhaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5150: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca gandhaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā rasaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5151: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rasaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ sparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5152: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā dharmān samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5153: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dharmāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5155: tathā hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotravijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5156: tathā hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotravṇñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5158: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāvijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5159: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāvijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyavyñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5160: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyavijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv o advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manovijñānaṃ samanunpaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5161: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manovijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5163: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam (ŚsP_II-1_159)
K02sspp2_1u:5165: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotrasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5166: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5167: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5168: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5169: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaḥsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5171: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:5172: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:5173: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:5174: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:5175: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:5176: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5178: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca pṛthivīdhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abdhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5179: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābdhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ tejodhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5180: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca tejodhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vāyudhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5181: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vāyudhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkārm. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ākāśadhātuṃ (ŚsP_II-1_160)
K02sspp2_1u:5183: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ākāśadhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vijñānadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5184: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānadhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5186: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāvidyā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ saṃskārān samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5187: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskārāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5188: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter nāmarūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5189: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca nāmarūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5190: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5191: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5192: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ tṛṣṇāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5193: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca tṛṣṇā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter upādānaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5194: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca upādānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter bhavaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5195: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bhavaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter jātiṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5196: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jātiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter jarāmaraṇaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5197: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jarāmaraṇaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5199: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dānapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter śīlapāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5200: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śīlapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter kṣāntipāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5201: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kṣāntipāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vīryapāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5202: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vīryapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. (ŚsP_II-1_161)
K02sspp2_1u:5204: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dhyānapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter prajñāpāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5205: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prajñāpāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5207: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cādhyātmaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5208: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bahirdhāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5209: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5210: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śūnyatāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5211: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ paramārthaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5212: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca paramārthaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5213: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5214: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter atyantaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5215: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cātyantaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter anavarāgraśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5216: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cānavarāgraśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter anavakāraśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5217: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cānavakāraśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5218: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prakṛtiśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5219: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5220: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter anupalambhaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5221: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cānupalambhaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5222: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābhāvaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5223: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca svabhāvaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5224: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5226: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca smṛtyupasthānāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ samyakprahāṇāni samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5227: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca samyakprahāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ṛddhipādān samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5228: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ṛddhipādāṃś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter indriyāṇi samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5229: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cendriyāṇi cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter balāni samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5230: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca balāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter bodhyaṅgāni samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5231: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bodhyaṅgāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5232: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter āryasatyāni samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5233: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāryasatyāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter dhyānāni samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5234: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dhyānāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter apramāṇāni samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5235: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāpramāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5236: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cārūpyasamāpattiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter aṣṭau vimokṣāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5237: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāṣṭau vimokṣāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5238: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ (ŚsP_II-1_163)
K02sspp2_1u:5240: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāpramāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abhijñāḥ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5241: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābhijñāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ samādhīn samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5242: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca samādhayaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter dhāraṇīmukhāni samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5243: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dhāraṇīmukhāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter daśatathāgatabalāni samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5244: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca daśatathāgatabalāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteś catvāri vaiśāradyāni samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5245: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5246: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahāmaitrīṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5247: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahāmaitrī cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahākaruṇāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5248: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahākaruṇā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5249: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5250: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mārgākārajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5251: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mārgākārajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5252: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvākārajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_1u:5253: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret.
K02sspp2_1u:5254: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivam āha kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi,
K02sspp2_1u:5255: sacet bodhisatto mahāsattva evam uddiśyamānenotrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam
K02sspp2_1u:5256: āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_1u:5258: nirīhakāt sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. svapnopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
K02sspp2_1u:5259: māyopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. mārīcyupamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
K02sspp2_1u:5260: pratiśrutkopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. pratibhāsopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
K02sspp2_1u:5262: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasyati saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_1u:5264: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
K02sspp2_1u:5265: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etad iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5266: tasmin samaye vedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vedaneyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5267: tasmin samaye saṃjñāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃjñeyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5268: tasmin samaye saṃskārān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃskārā ima iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5269: tasmin samaye vijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vijñānam etad iti.
K02sspp2_1u:5270: tasmin samaye cakṣur nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣur etad iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5271: tasmin samaye śrotraṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotram etad iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5272: tasmin samaye ghrāṇaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇam etad iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5273: tasmin samaye jihvāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihveyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5274: tasmin samaye kāyaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyo 'yam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5275: tasmin samaye mano nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati mana etad iti.
K02sspp2_1u:5276: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etad iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5277: tasmin samaye śabdaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śabdo 'yam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5278: tasmin samaye gandhaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati gandho 'yam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5279: tasmin samaye rasaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati (ŚsP_II-1_165)
K02sspp2_1u:5281: tasmin samaye sparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati sparśao 'yam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5282: tasmin samaye dharmān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dharmā ima iti.
K02sspp2_1u:5283: tasmin samaye cakṣurvijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣurvijñānam etad iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5284: tasmin samaye śrotravijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotravijñānam etad iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5285: tasmin samaye ghrāṇavijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajftāpayati ghrāṇavijñānam etad iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5286: tasmin samaye jihvāvijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāvijñānam etad iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5287: tasmin samaye kāyavijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyavijñānam etad iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5288: tasmin samaye manovijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manovijñānam etad iti.
K02sspp2_1u:5289: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5290: tasmin samaye śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotrasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5291: tasmin samaye ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5292: tasmin samaye jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāsaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5293: tasmin samaye kāyasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5294: tasmin samaye manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥsaṃsparśo 'yam iti.
K02sspp2_1u:5295: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam
K02sspp2_1u:5296: tasmin samaye śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam
K02sspp2_1u:5297: tasmin samaye ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam
K02sspp2_1u:5298: tasmin samaye jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5300: nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5301: tasmin samaye manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti.
K02sspp2_1u:5302: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
K02sspp2_1u:5303: tasmin samaye dānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dānapāramiteyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5304: tasmin samaye śīlapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śīlapāramiteyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5305: tasmin samaye kṣāntipāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kṣāntipāramiteyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5306: tasmin samaye vīryapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vīryapāramiteyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5307: tasmin samaye dhyānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dhyānapāramiteyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5308: tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati prajñāpāramiteyam iti.
K02sspp2_1u:5309: tasmin samaye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty adhyātmaśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5310: tasmin samaye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati bahirdhāśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5311: tasmin samaye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5312: tasmin samaye śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śūnyatāśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5313: tasmin samaye mahāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati mahāśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5314: tasmin samaye paramārthaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati paramārthaśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5315: tasmin samaye saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃskṛtaśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5316: tasmin samaye 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty asaṃskṛtaśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5317: tasmin samaye 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty atyantaśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5318: tasmin samaye 'navarāgraśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anavarāgraśūnyateyam (ŚsP_II-1_167)
K02sspp2_1u:5319: iti, tasmin samaye 'navakāraśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anavakāraśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5320: tasmin samaye prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati prakṛtiśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5321: tasmin samaye sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati sarvadharmaśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5322: tasmin samaye svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati svalakṣaṇaśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5323: tasmin samaye 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anupalambhaśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5324: tasmin samaye 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty abhāvaśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5325: tasmin samaye svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati svabhāvaśūnyateyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5326: tasmin samaye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateyam iti.
K02sspp2_1u:5327: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caran smṛtyupasthānāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati smṛtyupasthānāny etānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5328: tasmin samaye samyakprahāṇāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samyakprahāṇāny etānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5329: tasmin samaye ṛddhipādān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati ṛddhipādā imā iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5330: tasmin samaye indriyāṇi nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayatīndriyāṇy etānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5331: tasmin samaye balāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati balānīmānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5332: tasmin samaye bodhyaṅgāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati bodhyaṅgānīmānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5333: tasmin samaye āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āryāṣṭaṅgo mārga iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5334: tasmin samaye āryasatyāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āryasatyāny etānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5335: tasmin samaye dhyānāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dhyānāny etānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5336: tasmin samaye 'pramāṇāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty apramāṇāny etānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5337: tasmin samaye ārūpyasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty ārūpyasamāpattaya imā iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5338: tasmin samaye 'ṣṭau vimokṣān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty aṣṭau vimokṣā (ŚsP_II-1_168)
K02sspp2_1u:5339: ima iti, tasmin samaye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya imā iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5340: tasmin samaye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny
K02sspp2_1u:5341: tasmin samaye 'bhijñā nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty abhijñā imā iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5342: tasmin samaye samādhīn nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhaya ima iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5343: tasmin samaye dhāraṇīmukhāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dhāraṇīmukhāny etānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5344: tasmin samaye daśatathāgatabalāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati daśatathāgatabalānīmānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5345: tasmin samaye catvāri vaiśāradyāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati catvāri vaiśāradyānīmānīti,
K02sspp2_1u:5346: tasmin samaye catasraḥ pratisaṃvido nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati catasraḥ pratisaṃvida imā iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5347: tasmin samaye mahāmaitrīṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahāmaitrīyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5348: tasmin samaye mahākaruṇāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahākaruṇeyam iti,
K02sspp2_1u:5349: tasmin samaye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āveṇikā buddhadharmā eta iti.
K02sspp2_1u:5350: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni
K02sspp2_1u:5351: nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati sarvasamadhidhāraṇīmukhāṇy etānīti.
K02sspp2_1u:5353: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_1u:5457: tathā hi bhagavan yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam,
K02sspp2_1u:5459: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5460: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5461: tasmād yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5462: tathā hi bhagavan yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5463: iti hi vedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5464: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5465: tasmād yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5466: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
K02sspp2_1u:5467: iti hi saṃjñā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5468: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5469: tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
K02sspp2_1u:5470: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārā,
K02sspp2_1u:5471: iti hi saṃskārāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5472: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5473: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5474: tathā hi bhagavan yo vijñānasyānutpādo na te vijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5475: iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5476: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5477: tasmād yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ.
K02sspp2_1u:5478: tathā hi yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5480: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5481: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5482: tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5483: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotram,
K02sspp2_1u:5484: iti hi śrotraṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5485: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5486: tasmād yah śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotraṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5487: tathā hi bhagavan ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇam,
K02sspp2_1u:5488: iti hi ghrāṇaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5489: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5490: tasmād yo ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5491: tathā hi bhagavan jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
K02sspp2_1u:5492: iti hi jihvā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5493: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5494: tasmād yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
K02sspp2_1u:5495: tathā hi yo bhagavan kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5496: iti hi kāyaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5497: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5498: tasmād yaḥ kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5499: tathā hi yo bhagavan manaso 'nutpādo na tan manaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5500: iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5501: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5502: tasmād yo manaso nutpādo na tan manaḥ.
K02sspp2_1u:5503: yo bhagavan rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam,
K02sspp2_1u:5504: iti hi rūpaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5505: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5506: tasmād yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5507: yo bhagavan śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5508: iti hi śabdaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5509: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5510: tasmād yaḥ śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5511: yo bhagavan gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5512: iti hi gandhaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5513: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5514: tasmād yo gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5515: yo bhagavan rasasyānutpādo na sa rasaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5516: iti hi rasaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5517: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5518: tasmād yo rasasyānutpādo na so rasaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5519: yo bhagavan sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśa,
K02sspp2_1u:5520: iti hi sparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5521: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5522: tasmād yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5523: yo bhagavan dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5524: iti hi dharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5525: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5526: tasmād yo dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5527: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5528: iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5529: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5530: tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5531: yo bhagavan śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5532: iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5533: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5534: tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5535: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5536: iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5537: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5538: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5539: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5540: iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5541: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5542: tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5543: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5544: iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5545: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5546: tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5547: yo bhagavan manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5548: iti hi manovijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5549: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād (ŚsP_II-1_173)
K02sspp2_1u:5551: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5552: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5553: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5554: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5555: yo bhagavan śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5556: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5557: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5558: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5559: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5560: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5561: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5562: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5563: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na tan jihvāsaṃsparśaaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5564: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5565: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5566: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5567: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5568: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5569: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5570: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5571: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5572: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5573: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5574: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5575: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5576: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5577: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5578: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5579: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5580: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5582: eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5583: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5584: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5585: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5586: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5587: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5588: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5589: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5590: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5591: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5592: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5593: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5594: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5595: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5596: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5597: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5598: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5599: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5600: yo bhagavan pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5601: iti hi pṛthivīdhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5602: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5603: tasmād yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5604: yo bhagavan abdhātor anutpādo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5605: iti hy abdhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5606: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5608: yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5612: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5613: tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5614: yo bhagavan vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5615: iti hi vāyudhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5616: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5617: tasmād yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na so vāyudhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5618: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5619: iti hy ākāśadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5620: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5621: tasmād ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5622: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor anutpādo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5623: iti hi vijñānadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5624: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5625: tasmād yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na so vijñānadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5626: yo bhagavann avidyāyā anutpādo na sāvidyā,
K02sspp2_1u:5627: iti hy avidyā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5628: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5630: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5631: iti hi saṃskārāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5633: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5634: tasmād yo saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5635: yo bhagavan vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5636: iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5637: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5638: tasmād yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5639: yo bhagavan nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpam,
K02sspp2_1u:5640: iti hi nāmarūpaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5641: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5642: tasmād yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5643: yo bhagavan ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanam,
K02sspp2_1u:5644: iti hi ṣaḍāyatanañ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5645: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād (ŚsP_II-1_176)
K02sspp2_1u:5647: yo bhagavan sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5648: iti hi sparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5649: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5650: tasmād yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5651: yo bhagavan vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5652: iti hi vedanāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5653: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5654: tasmād yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5655: yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
K02sspp2_1u:5656: iti hi tṛṣṇāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5657: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5658: tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
K02sspp2_1u:5659: yo bhagavan upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5660: iti hy upādānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5661: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5662: tasmād ya upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5663: yo bhagavan bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5664: iti hi bhavaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5665: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5666: tasmād yo bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5667: yo bhagavan jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5668: iti hi jātiś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5669: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5670: tasmād yo jātier anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5671: yo bhagavan jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇam,
K02sspp2_1u:5672: iti hi jarāmaraṇaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5673: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5674: tasmād yo jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5675: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5676: iti hi dānapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5677: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5678: tasmād yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5679: yo bhagavan śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5680: iti hi śīlapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? (ŚsP_II-1_177)
K02sspp2_1u:5681: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5682: tasmād yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5683: yo bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5684: iti hi kṣāntipāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5685: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5686: tasmād yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5687: yo bhagavan vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5688: iti hi vīryapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5689: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5690: tasmād yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5691: yo bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5692: iti hi dhyānapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5693: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5694: tasmād yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5695: yo bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5696: iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5697: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5698: tasmād yo prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajnāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_1u:5699: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5700: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5701: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5703: yo bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5704: iti hi bahirdhāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5705: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5706: tasmād yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5707: yo bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5708: iti hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5709: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5711: yo bhagavan śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5712: iti hi śūnyatāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5713: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād (ŚsP_II-1_178)
K02sspp2_1u:5714: yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5715: yo bhagavan mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5716: iti hi mahāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5717: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5718: tasmād yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5719: yo bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5720: iti hi paramārthaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5721: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5722: tasmād yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5723: yo bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5724: iti hi saṃskṛtaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5725: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5726: tasmād yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5727: yo bhagavan asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5728: iti hy asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5729: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5731: yo bhagavan atyantaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sātyantaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5732: iti hy atyantaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5733: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5735: yo bhagavan anavarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5736: iti hy anavarāgraśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5737: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5739: yo bhagavan anavakāraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5740: iti hy anavakāraśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5741: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5743: yo bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5744: iti hi prakṛtiśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5745: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5746: tasmād yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5747: yo bhagavan sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā, (ŚsP_II-1_179)
K02sspp2_1u:5748: iti hi sarvadharmaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5749: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5750: tasmād yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5751: yo bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5752: iti hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5753: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5754: tasmād yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5755: yo bhagavan anupalambhaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5756: iti hy anupalambhaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5757: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5759: yo bhagavan abhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5760: iti hy abhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5761: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5763: yo bhagavan svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5764: iti hi svabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5765: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5766: tasmād yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5767: yo bhagavan abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5768: iti hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5769: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5771: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānānīti hi smṛtyupasthānāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5772: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5773: tasmād yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5774: yo bhagavan samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇānīti hi samyakprahāṇāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5775: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5776: tasmād yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5777: yo bhagavann ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na te ṛddhipādā iti hy ṛddhipādāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5778: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5779: tasmād y a ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5780: yo bhagavann indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇīti hīndriyāṇi cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5781: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5782: tasmād ya indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇi,
K02sspp2_1u:5783: yo bhagavan balānām anutpādo na tāni balānīti hi balāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5784: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5785: tasmād yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5786: yo bhagavan bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgānīti hi bodhyaṅgāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5787: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5788: tasmād yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5789: yo bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga iti hy āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5790: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5791: tasmād ya āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5792: yo bhagavann āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyānīti hi āryasatyāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5793: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5794: tasmād y a āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5795: yo bhagavan dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānānīti hi dhyānāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5796: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5797: tasmād yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5798: yo bhagavann apramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇānīti hy apramāṇāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5799: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5800: tasmād yo 'pramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5801: yo bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattaya iti hy ārūpyasamāpattayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. (ŚsP_II-1_181)
K02sspp2_1u:5803: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5804: tasmād ya ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5805: yo bhagavan vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣā iti hi vimokṣāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5806: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5807: tasmād yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5808: yo bhagavann anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5809: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5810: tasmād yo nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5811: yo bhagavann śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti
K02sspp2_1u:5812: hi śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5813: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5814: tasmād yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5815: yo bhagavann abhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñā iti hy abhijñāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5816: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5817: tasmād yo 'bhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5818: yo bhagavan samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhaya iti hy samādhayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5819: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5820: tasmād yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5821: yo bhagavann dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhānīti hy dhāraṇīmukhāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5822: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5823: tasmād yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāny dhāraṇīmukhāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5824: yo bhagavan daśatathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni daśatathāgatabalānīti hi daśatathāgatabalāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya
K02sspp2_1u:5825: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5826: tasmād yo daśatathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5827: yo bhagavan vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyānīti hi vaiśāradyāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5828: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5829: tasmād yo vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
K02sspp2_1u:5830: yo bhagavan pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tāḥ pratisaṃvida iti hi pratisaṃvidaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5831: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5832: tasmād yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5833: yo bhagavan mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sa mahāmaitrī iti hi mahāmaitrī cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5834: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5835: tasmād yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
K02sspp2_1u:5836: yo bhagavan mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
K02sspp2_1u:5837: iti hi mahākaruṇā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5838: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5839: tasmād yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
K02sspp2_1u:5840: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmānām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmā iti hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5841: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5842: tasmād ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5843: yo bhagavan tathatāyā anutpādo na sa tathatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5844: iti hi tathatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5845: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5846: tasmād yaḥ tathatāyā anutpādo na sa tathatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5847: yo bhagavan dharmatāyā anutpādo na tā dharmatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5848: iti hi dharmatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5849: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5850: tasmād yo dharmatāyā anutpādo na sā dharmatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5851: yo bhagavan dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5852: iti hi dharmadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5853: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5854: tasmād yo dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5855: yo bhagavan dharmaniyāmatāyā anutpādo na sa dharmaniyāmatā, iti hi (ŚsP_II-1_183)
K02sspp2_1u:5856: dharmaniyāmatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5857: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5858: tasmād yo dharmaniyāmatāyā anutpādo na ta dharmaniyāmatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5859: yo bhagavan bhūtakoṭer anutpādo na sā bhūtakoṭir iti hi bhūtakoṭiś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5860: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5861: tasmād yo bhūtakoṭer anutpādo na sā bhūtakoṭiḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5862: yo bhagavann acintyadhātor anutpādo na so 'cintyahātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5863: iti hy acintyadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5864: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5866: yo bhagavan sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5867: iti hi sarvajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5869: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5870: tasmād yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5871: yo bhagavan mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5872: iti hi mārgākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5873: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5874: tasmād yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5875: yo bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā,
K02sspp2_1u:5876: iti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5877: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5878: tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
K02sspp2_1u:5879: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam,
K02sspp2_1u:5880: iti hi rūpañ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5881: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5882: tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5883: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5884: iti hi vedanā ca vyayas cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5885: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5886: tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5887: yo bhagavan saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
K02sspp2_1u:5888: iti hi saṃjñā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5890: vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5891: tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
K02sspp2_1u:5892: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
