K02sspp2_1u:5893: iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5894: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5895: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārānāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5896: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5897: iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5898: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5899: tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam.
K02sspp2_1u:5900: yo bhagavan cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5901: iti hi cakṣuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5902: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5903: tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5904: yo bhagavan chrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotram,
K02sspp2_1u:5905: iti hi śrotraṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5906: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5907: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotraṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5908: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇam,
K02sspp2_1u:5909: iti hi ghrāṇaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5910: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5911: tasmād yo ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5912: yo bhagavan jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
K02sspp2_1u:5913: iti hi jihvā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5914: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5915: tasmād yo jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
K02sspp2_1u:5916: yo bhagavan kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5917: iti hi kāyaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5918: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5919: tasmād yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5920: yo bhagavan manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5921: iti hi manaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5922: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5923: tasmād yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.
K02sspp2_1u:5924: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam iti hi rūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5925: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5926: tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5927: yo bhagavan śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5928: iti hi śabdaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5929: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5930: tasmād yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5931: yo bhagavan gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5932: iti hi gandhaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5933: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5934: tasmād yo gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5935: yo bhagavan rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5936: iti hi rasaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5937: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5938: tasmād yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5939: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5940: iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5941: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5942: tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5943: yo bhagavan dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5944: iti hi dharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5946: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5947: tasmād yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5948: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5949: iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5950: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5951: tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5952: yo bhagavan chrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5953: iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5954: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5955: tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5956: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5957: iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? (ŚsP_II-1_186)
K02sspp2_1u:5958: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5959: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5960: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5961: iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5962: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5963: tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5964: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5965: iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5966: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5967: tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:5968: yo bhagavan manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:5969: iti hi manovijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5970: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5971: tasmād yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
K02sspp2_1u:5972: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5973: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5974: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5975: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5976: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5977: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5978: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5979: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśassya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5980: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5981: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5982: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5983: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5984: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5985: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5986: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5987: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5988: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5989: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5990: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5991: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5992: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:5993: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5994: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5995: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
K02sspp2_1u:5996: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:5997: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:5998: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:5999: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6000: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6001: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6002: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6003: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6004: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6005: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6006: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6007: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6008: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6009: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6010: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6011: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6012: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6013: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6014: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6015: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6016: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6017: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6018: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6019: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
K02sspp2_1u:6020: yo bhagavan pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6021: iti hi pṛthivīdhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6022: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6023: tasmād yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6024: yo bhagavann abdhātor vyayo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6025: iti hy abdhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6026: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6028: yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6029: iti hi tejodhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:6031: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6032: tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6033: yo bhagavan vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6034: iti hi vāyudhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6035: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6036: tasmād yo vāyudhātor vyayo na so vāyudhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6037: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa akāśadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6038: iti hy ākāśadhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6039: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6040: tasmād ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6041: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6042: iti hi vijñānadhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6043: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6044: tasmād yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na so vijñānadhātuḥ.
K02sspp2_1u:6045: yo bhagavann avidyāyā vyayo na sāvidyā,
K02sspp2_1u:6046: iti hy avidyā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6047: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6049: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6050: iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6051: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6052: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6053: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
K02sspp2_1u:6054: iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6056: na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6057: tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:6058: yo bhagavan nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpam,
K02sspp2_1u:6059: iti hi nāmarūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6060: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6061: tasmād yo nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:6062: yo bhagavan ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanam,
K02sspp2_1u:6063: iti hi ṣaḍāyatanañ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6064: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6065: tasmād yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:6066: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6067: iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6068: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6069: tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6070: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6071: iti hi vedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6072: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6073: tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_1u:6074: yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
K02sspp2_1u:6075: iti hi tṛṣṇā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6076: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6077: tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
K02sspp2_1u:6078: yo bhagavan upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānam,
K02sspp2_1u:6079: iti hy upādānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6080: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6081: tasmād ya upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānaṃ,
K02sspp2_1u:6082: yo bhagavan bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6083: iti hi bhavaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6084: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6085: tasmād yo bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6086: yo bhagavan jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6087: iti hi jātiś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6088: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6089: tasmād yo jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6090: yo bhagavan jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam, iti hi (ŚsP_II-1_190)
K02sspp2_1u:6091: jarāmaraṇaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6092: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6093: tasmād yo jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
K02sspp2_1u:6094: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,

K02sspp2_1u:6097: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,

K02sspp2_1u:6126: tasmād yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,

K02sspp2_1u:6131: yo bhagavan śūnyatāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,

K02sspp2_1u:6159: yo bhagavann anavakāraśūnyatāyā vyayo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,

K02sspp2_1u:6177: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6179: yo bhagavann abhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:6180: iti hy abhāvaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6181: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6183: yo bhagavan svabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:6184: iti hi svabhāvaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6185: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6186: tasmād yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:6187: yo bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_1u:6188: iti hy abhāvasvabhāvaśunyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6189: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6191: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānānīti (ŚsP_II-1_193)
K02sspp2_1u:6192: hi smṛtyupasthānāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6193: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6194: tasmād yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
K02sspp2_1u:6195: yo bhagavan samyakprahāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāni samyakprahāṇānīti hi samyakprahāṇāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6196: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6197: tasmād yaḥ samyakprahāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
K02sspp2_1u:6198: yo bhagavann ṛddhipādānāṃ vyayo na te ṛddhipādā,
K02sspp2_1u:6199: iti hy ṛddhipādāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6200: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6201: tasmād ya ṛddhipādānāṃ vyayo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6202: yo bhagavann indriyāṇāṃ vyayo na tānīndriyāṇi,
K02sspp2_1u:6203: iti hīndriyāṇi ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6204: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6205: tasmād ya indriyāṇāṃ vyayo na tānīndriyāṇi,
K02sspp2_1u:6206: yo bhagavan balānāṃ vyayo na tāni balāni,
K02sspp2_1u:6207: iti hi balāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6208: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6209: tasmād yo balānāṃ vyayo na tāni balāni,

K02sspp2_1u:6211: iti hi bodhyaṅgāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?

K02sspp2_1u:6217: yo bhagavann āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni,
K02sspp2_1u:6218: iti hi āryasatyāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6219: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6220: tasmād ya āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni,
K02sspp2_1u:6221: yo bhagavan dhyānānāṃ vyayo na tāni dhyānānīti hi dhyānāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6222: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6225: yo bhagavann apramāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāny apramāṇānīti hy apramāṇāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6226: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6227: tasmād yo 'pramāṇānāṃ vyayo na tāny apramāṇāni,
K02sspp2_1u:6228: yo bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā ārūpyasamāpattaya iti hy ārūpyasamāpattayaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6229: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6230: tasmād ya ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6231: yo bhagavan vimokṣāṇāṃ vyayo na te vimokṣā iti hi vimokṣāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6232: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6233: tasmād yo vimokṣāṇāṃ vyayo na te vimokṣāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6234: yo bhagavan navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6235: iti hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6236: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6237: tasmād yo 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ vyayo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6238: yo bhagavañ chūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti
K02sspp2_1u:6239: hi śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6240: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6241: tasmād yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
K02sspp2_1u:6242: yo bhagavann abhijñānāṃ vyayo na tā abhijñā,
K02sspp2_1u:6243: iti hy abhijñāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6244: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6245: tasmād yo 'bhijñānāṃ vyayo na tā abhijñāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6246: yo bhagavan samādhīnāṃ vyayo na te samādhayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6247: iti hi samādhayaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6248: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6249: tasmād yaḥ samādhīnāṃ vyayo na te samādhayaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6250: yo bhagavan dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhānīti hy dhāraṇīmukhāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? (ŚsP_II-1_195)
K02sspp2_1u:6251: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6252: tasmād yo dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ vyayo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
K02sspp2_1u:6253: yo bhagavan daśatathāgatabalānāṃ vyayo na tāni daśatathāgatabalānīti hi daśatathāgatabalāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya
K02sspp2_1u:6254: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6255: tasmād yo daśatathāgatabalānāṃ vyayo na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni,
K02sspp2_1u:6256: yo bhagavan vaiśāradyānāṃ vyayo na tāni vaiśāradyānīti hi vaiśāradyāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6257: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6258: tasmād yo vaiśāradyānāṃ vyayo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
K02sspp2_1u:6259: yo bhagavan pratisaṃvidāṃ vyayo na tāḥ pratisaṃvida iti hi pratisaṃvidaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6260: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6261: tasmād yaḥ pratisaṃvidāṃ vyayo na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6262: yo bhagavan mahāmaitryā vyayo na sā mahāmaitrī,
K02sspp2_1u:6263: iti hi mahāmaitrī ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6264: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6265: tasmād yo mahāmaitryā vyayo na sā mahāmaitrī,
K02sspp2_1u:6266: yo bhagavan mahākaruṇāyā vyayo na sā mahākaruṇā,
K02sspp2_1u:6267: iti hi mahākaruṇā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6268: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6269: tasmād yo mahākaruṇāyā vyayo na sā mahākaruṇā,
K02sspp2_1u:6270: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6271: iti hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6272: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6273: tasmād ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_1u:6274: yo bhagavan sarvajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvajñatā,
K02sspp2_1u:6275: iti hi sarvajñatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6276: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6277: tasmād yaḥ sarvajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvajñatā,
K02sspp2_1u:6278: yo bhagavan mārgākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
K02sspp2_1u:6279: iti hi mārgākārajñatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6280: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo (ŚsP_II-1_196)
K02sspp2_1u:6282: yo bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā,
K02sspp2_1u:6283: iti hi sarvākārajñatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_1u:6284: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
K02sspp2_1u:6285: tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
K02sspp2_1u:6286: yat punar bhgavān ucyate rūpam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6287: yad ucyate vedanety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,

K02sspp2_1u:6289: yad ucyate saṃskārā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6290: yad ucyate vijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
K02sspp2_1u:6291: yad ucyate cakṣur ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6292: yad ucyate śrotram ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6293: yad ucyate ghrāṇam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6294: yad ucyate jihvety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6295: yad ucyate kāya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6296: yad ucyate mana ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
K02sspp2_1u:6297: yad ucyate rūpam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6298: yad ucyate śabda ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6299: yad ucyate gandha ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6300: yad ucyate rasa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6301: yad ucyate sparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,

K02sspp2_1u:6303: yad ucyate cakṣurvijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,

K02sspp2_1u:6305: yad ucyate ghrāṇavijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6306: yad ucyate jihvāvijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6307: yad ucyate kāyavijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6308: yad ucyate manovijñānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
K02sspp2_1u:6309: yad ucyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā (ŚsP_II-1_197)
K02sspp2_1u:6311: yad ucyate śrotrasaṃsparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6312: yad ucyate ghrāṇasaṃsparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6313: yad ucyate jihvāsaṃsparśa ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,

K02sspp2_1u:6334: yad ucyate vedanety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6335: yad ucyate tṛṣṇety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6336: yad ucyate upādānam ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6337: yad ucyate bhava ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6338: yad ucyate jātir ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6339: yad ucyate jarāmaraṇām ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā (ŚsP_II-1_198)
K02sspp2_1u:6341: yad ucyate dānapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6342: yad ucyate śīlapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6343: yad ucyate kṣāntipāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6344: yad ucyate vīryapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasyadharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6345: yad ucyate dhyānapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6346: yad ucyate prajñāpāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
K02sspp2_1u:6347: yad ucyate 'dhyātmaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6348: yad ucyate bahirdhāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6349: yad ucyate 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6350: yad ucyate śūnyatāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6351: yad ucyate mahāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6352: yad ucyate paramārthaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6353: yad ucyate saṃskṛtaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6354: yad ucyate 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6355: yad ucyate 'tyantaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6356: yad ucyate 'navarāgraśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6357: yad ucyate 'navakāraśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6358: yad ucyate prakṛtiśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6359: yad ucyate sarvadharmaśūnyatety advayasyā saṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6360: yad ucyate svalakṣaṇaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6361: yad ucyate 'nupalambhaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6362: yad ucyate 'bhāvaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6363: yad ucyate svabhāvaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6364: yad ucyate 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
K02sspp2_1u:6365: yad ucyate smṛtyupasthānānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6366: yad ucyate samyakprahāṇānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6367: yad ucyate ṛddhipādā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6368: yad ucyate indriyānīti advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6371: yad ucyate bodhyaṅgānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6372: yad ucyate āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6373: yad ucyate āryasatyānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6374: yad ucyate dhyānānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6375: yad ucyate 'pramāṇānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6376: yad ucyate ārūpyasamāpattaya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6377: yad ucyate vimokṣā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6378: yad ucyate navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6379: yad ucyate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6380: yad ucyate 'bhijñā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6381: yad ucyate samādhaya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6382: yad ucyate dhāraṇīmukhānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6383: yad ucyate daśatathāgatabalānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6384: yad ucyate catvāri vaiśāradyānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6385: yad ucyate catasraḥ pratisaṃvida ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6386: yad ucyate mahāmaitrīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6387: yad ucyate mahākaruṇety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6388: yad ucyate 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6389: yad ucyate sarvajñatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6390: yad ucyate mārgākārajñatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
K02sspp2_1u:6391: yad ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā iti.
